brand_identity.name: LegalEase France (Provisional)
brand_identity.visual_metaphor: The Organized Desk of a Senior Partner

headings.usage: Use for all H1, H2, and Hero sections to evoke legal tradition.

body.usage: Use for all UI elements, forms, and long-read text for maximum clarity.

mono.usage: Use for citation references or legal code snippets.

primary.description: Deep Slate 900 - The color of authority and ink.

secondary.description: Slate 100 - Paper-like background for secondary actions.

accent.description: Amber 600 - Subtle gold/bronze for 'Success' or 'Premium' actions (replaces generic green).

textures.noise: Add a subtle 2% noise overlay to the background to simulate high-quality paper.

dashboard.usage: Use for the user dashboard to show history, active cases, and quick actions.

editor.structure: Sidebar (Tools/References) - Main Content (A4 Aspect Ratio) - Right Panel (AI Assistant)
editor.usage: The generation and editing interface must mimic a word processor.

landing.usage: Use large typography and negative space. No centering.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). No pill shapes.

modals.style: Backdrop blur-sm. White background with sharp corners.

hero_bg.desc: Modern bright home office - use for Hero section background or split layout.

texture_abstract.desc: Broken white marble - use for 'Why Us' or 'Legal Authority' section backgrounds.

action_shot.desc: Person writing on white form paper - use for 'How it works' or 'Editor' feature showcase.

motion_guidelines.page_load: Staggered fade-in for grid items (0.1s delay per item).
motion_guidelines.hover_effects: Subtle lift (translate-y) + border darkening. No color explosion.

instructions_to_main_agent: Configure Tailwind: Add EB Garamond as 'font-serif' and Manrope as 'font-sans'. Set 'slate-900' as primary.
Icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) to match the elegant theme.
Paper Effect: Apply a global class to the body that adds a very subtle grain texture if possible, or stick to pure slate-50 background.
Forms: Split long forms into 'Step by Step' wizards. Do not show one giant form.
Legal Text: When displaying generated legal text, use a distinct font style (e.g., larger line-height, serif) to differentiate it from UI text.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers only.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤– etc.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a 'data-testid' attribute.
